name: D. Mushroom Scientists
statement:
As you very well know, the whole Universe traditionally uses
three-dimensional Cartesian system of coordinates. In this system each
point corresponds to three real coordinates . In this coordinate system,
the distance between the center of the Universe and the point is
calculated by the following formula: . Mushroom scientists that work for
the Great Mushroom King think that the Universe isn’t exactly right and
the distance from the center of the Universe to a point equals .To test
the metric of mushroom scientists, the usual scientists offered them a
task: find such , that the distance between the center of the Universe
and the point is maximum possible in the metric of mushroom scientists.
The mushroom scientists aren’t good at maths, so they commissioned you
to do the task.Note that in this problem, it is considered that .
